name: Velvet Midnight Gown
shortDescription: An elegant evening gown with timeless flair.
description: Crafted from rich velvet, this midnight-black gown exudes sophistication and grace. Perfect for upscale events, it drapes effortlessly with a flattering silhouette that turns heads.

name: Pearl Twist Heels
shortDescription: Graceful heels with a pearl-adorned strap.
description: These heels are designed for comfort and class. With a subtle twist strap lined with pearls, they add luxury to every step, whether it's a formal dinner or a casual evening out.

name: Golden Crescent Bag
shortDescription: Chic leather handbag with a golden crescent handle.
description: The Golden Crescent Bag balances practicality and luxury. The curved handle and structured shape make it a standout piece that complements both day and night looks effortlessly.

name: Silky Auburn Wig
shortDescription: Natural-looking wig with silky auburn waves.
description: This premium wig brings vibrance and volume in all the right places. Made with high-quality fibers, it offers a realistic texture and effortless glamour for all face types.

name: Empress Drop Earrings
shortDescription: Delicate long-drop earrings with crystal accents.
description: Refined and feminine, the Empress Earrings sparkle with every move. Lightweight yet statement-worthy, they're perfect for elevating casual wear or pairing with elegant attire.

name: Hand-Painted Feather Fan
shortDescription: Elegant hand fan with custom floral design.
description: Combining tradition and modern flair, this accessory adds poise and personality. Each fan is hand-painted with floral accents, making every piece a one-of-a-kind companion to evening dresses or cultural wear.

name: Ivory Luxe Two-Piece
shortDescription: A minimal yet striking ivory crop and skirt set.
description: The Luxe Two-Piece set captures elegance through simplicity. The structured crop top and flowing skirt move with grace, perfect for cocktail parties or weekend getaways.
